title: E field and potential map - E direction at point X

content.question: The figure shows equipotential curves in a region of space that has an electric field. What is the direction of the electric field at Point <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>?

choices.label: Toward the top of the figure
Toward the bottom of the figure

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
